title: 2001년 Sanford 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Sanford. 판결일: 2001-05-29. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Joseph Sanford
**판결일**: 2001-05-29
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 283 A.D.2d 660
- 725 N.Y.S.2d 870

## 판결문 요약


—Appeal by the defendant from a judgment of the Supreme Court, Queens County (Eng, J.), rendered September 4, 1996, convicting him of attempted murder in the first degree (two counts), criminal possession of a weapon in the second degree, and criminal possession of a weapon in the third degree, upon a jury verdict, and imposing sentence.
Ordered that the judgment is affirmed.
Viewing the evidence in the light most favorable to the People (see, People v Contes, 60 NY2d 620), we find that it was legally sufficient to establish the defendant’s guilt beyond a reasonable doubt. Moreover, upon the exercise of our factual review power, we are satisfied that the verdict of guilt was not against the weight of the evidence (see, CPL 470.15 [5]).
The sentence imposed was not excessive (see, People v Suitte, 90 AD2d 80).
The defendant’s remaining contention is unpreserved for appellate review and, in any event, without merit. O’Brien, J. P., Altman, Luciano and Adams, JJ., concur.
...
